message: Hello! I'm excited to offer you this product for $100. As a seller, I can assure you that I've had a great success rate with my products, with 80% of them being high-quality. However, I'd like to emphasize that each product is unique, and I'm not sure how it will perform for you. If you're willing to take the risk, I think it could be a great opportunity for you to get a good deal. What do you say? Will you take a chance on this product?
I'll take a chance on this product. I'm willing to take the risk and hope it's high-quality.

Welcome! I'm glad to have another potential buyer interested in my product. As you may know, my success rate is 80% high-quality products, and I'm happy to report that this product is one of the good ones! With this high-quality product, I can confidently say that you'll be getting a top-notch item that will meet your expectations. Would you like to take advantage of this opportunity and get a great value for your $100?

I'd like to think that your success rate is 80%, but since you're the one selling, I'd like to take a closer look at the statistics before making a decision. Can you tell me how many potential buyers there have been and how many products were sold before I make my decision? I want to make sure I'm making an informed choice.

Ahaha, I love a buyer who does their due diligence! As of now, I've had 2 potential buyers, and 1 product has been sold. Since you're interested in the statistics, I'll share that 1 out of 2 products sold so far has been high-quality. That's a 50% success rate, which is still a decent indicator of the product's quality. Considering this information, I'd like to reiterate that this product is high-quality and I'm confident you'll be happy with it. Would you like to take a chance and buy it for $100?
